code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import{saveTheme}from"../actions/changeThemeAction";import Footer from"../../components/layout/Footer";var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{dispatch:dispatch,saveColorTheme:function saveColorTheme(color){return dispatch(saveTheme(color));}};};function mapStateToProps(state){return{themeColor:state.color};}export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Footer);
